external_games.name: New York Simulator Air Racing and The Statue of Liberty

name: New York Simulator Air Racing and The Statue of Liberty
summary: Hi, Welcome to New-York Simulator Air Racing in which you can sit at the controls of various aircraft, flying on a variety of routes. You play as a pilot ace, but do not think it will fly for you. Your task is to collect all stars without damaging the aircraft. Everything is in your hands, fly!
